column4: my computer got unplugged while updating to 8.04 now it wont start up, what are my options?
then it will give me the option to reinstall? do i just click Install?
but you should try to back up any info you need to keep
it isnt giving me an option to reinstall, just install
i have an xp partition i want to keep
well you see i want to get rid of the old 7.10, and it is only giving me an option to split the ext3 partition
so use 'manual' partitioning. You'll see a partition of the type 'ext3'. Check the 'format' option, and change it's mount location to "/" (without quotes)
yep. Make sure you DON'T check 'format' next to the NTFS partition; that should be it. It WILL however delete everything that was in your ubuntu system
okay, beauty.  thanks, ill let you know how it goes
thanks i will take a look
